All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Advance
A concrete implementation of the Command pattern representing the 'Advance' order.
AggressivePlayer
Class Aggressive Player defines the player who accumulates all his armies, attacks from their strongest country and deploys armies to maximize his forces on single country.
Airlift
This class represents the implementation of a Airlift card order.
BenevolentPlayer
Represents a Benevolent Player class, focusing solely on defending owned countries and refraining from attacking.
Blockade
This class represents the implementation of a Blockade order.
Bomb
This is the Bomb Card Class which is when used by player the target country loses half of its army units.
Card
The Card Order Interface.
CheaterPlayer
This class represents the Cheater Player, which launches direct attacks on neighboring enemy countries during the issue order phase.
Command
Represents a command entered by the user and provides methods to process and extract information from it.
CommonUtil
Utility class for common operations such as checking null/empty collections, strings, and objects.
ConquestMapFileReader
The ConquestMapFileReader class reads and parses conquest map files.
ConquestMapFileWriter
The ConquestMapFileWriter class is responsible for writing and creating Conquest map files.
Constants
 
Continent
The Continent class manages all the continents on the map.
Country
This class represents individual countries on the map.
Deploy
A concrete implementation of the Command pattern representing the 'Deploy' order.
Diplomacy
This class represents the implementation of a Diplomacy card order.
DominationMapFileReader
The MapFileReader class handles the parsing of map files.
DominationMapFileWriter
The MapFileWriter class is responsible for creating a generic map file.
GameContext
Represents the context of a game, including the map, players, orders, and error messages.
GameLoadingSaving
The GameLoadingSaving class manages the loading and saving of game files.
HumanPlayer
Represents a Human Player class with interactive behavior.
InvalidCommand
This exception is thrown to indicate that a map is invalid.
InvalidMap
This exception is thrown to indicate that a command is invalid.
IssueOrderPhase
Issue Order Phase state of the Warzone Game
LogEntryBuffer
The Logging Class that record every action takes place while game play.
Logger
This class writes the logs to the file.
Map
This class serves as a central hub for managing various aspects of maps, including continents and countries.
MapController
The MapController class is responsible for managing map-related operations in the Warzone game.
MapHelper
Helper class for generating random IDs.
MapReaderAdapter
An adapter class for reading conquest map files.
MapService
The MapService class loads, reads, parses, edits, and saves map files.
MapView
The MapView class is responsible for displaying the map and game state.
MapWriterAdapter
The MapWriterAdapter class serves as an adapter for writing to a conquest map file.
Order
This class is Command Class of the Command pattern that defines operations on order that every class must handle.
OrderExecutionPhase
Order Execution Phase state of the Warzone Game
Phase
State Class for phases in game which enforce state specific methods
Player
This class depicts player's information and services.
PlayerBehaviorStrategy
PlayerBehaviorStrategy is an abstract strategy class of Player's Behavior.
PlayerController
The PlayerController class is responsible for managing player-related operations in the Warzone game.
PlayerService
This service class handles the players.
PlayerView
Prints player names from the list of players and countries assigned to them
RandomPlayer
Represents a Random Player class, deploying armies randomly, attacking random neighboring countries, and moving armies randomly on its own territories.
StartupPhase
Startup Phase state of the Warzone Game
Tournament
Represents a tournament and holds information about map service, game states, and tournament-related operations.
TournamentModeView
Represents the view for tournament objects.
WarzoneEngine
This is the entry point of the Game and keeps the track of current Game State.
